comment.author: Joel
comment.text: From an unbiased viewpoint. Not on Trump's or Hillary's side. My gut tells me Trump is going to win. But all the stuff that I have learnt from education tells me there is no way Trump can win.

replies.author: Joel
replies.text: Like the things I have learnt at school. Like teachings.

replies.author: Jayce
replies.text: If Hill had any respect for the LGBT community, women and girls.... Her and her hubby would give back the millions that was donated to the Clinton's, by countries that have Sharia law/support. Give the money back, girl! Has anyone seen Hill? I need some hot sauce, check your purse, girl! Pandering little twit, disgusting! Just SayN :)

replies.author: Jonah
replies.text: He won't win if all the intelligent, decent people in America get out and vote in November.
